title: Bella Ramsey
summary:
Isabella May Ramsey (born September 2003) is an English actor. She is known for her breakout role as young noblewoman Lyanna Mormont in the HBO fantasy television series Game of Thrones (2016–2019) and Ellie in the HBO drama series The Last of Us (2023–present).
Ramsey has also played Mildred Hubble in the 2017 CBBC series The Worst Witch, and starred in the 2022 historical comedy film Catherine Called Birdy. The latter earned her a nomination for the Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Young Performer.
